DiceBag - Class in it.polimi.se2018.server.model.Components

DraftPool - Class in it.polimi.se2018.server.model.Components
Class DraftPool: representation in the game of the Draft Pool,contains the dice used by the players in the game, it is responsible for the creation and the clean of the pool in every round, it's associated with the Dice Bag, from where the pool draft the die
DraftPool() - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2018.server.model.Components.DraftPool
Class default constructor re-definition
DraftPool(int, DiceBag) - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2018.server.model.Components.DraftPool
Class constructor, create the Draft Pool of the current round associated with Dice Bag and the current number of players
DraftPool(DiceBag) - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2018.server.model.Components.DraftPool
Class constructor, create the Draft Pool of the current round and associate it to the Dice Bag
DraftPool(DraftPool) - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2018.server.model.Components.DraftPool
Class copy constructor, create a new Draft Pool from an old Draft Pool,useful to create a safe copy
